payload.text: What you've asked isn't quite clear to me, although I'm always learning. I can tell you about your accounts, help make payments, search your transactions, and answer questions.
alternatives: That request is over my head, although I'm always learning. I can tell you about your accounts, help make payments, search your transactions, and answer questions.
